short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snowman Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Snowman background. Custom Snow man wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Snowman wallpaper.
2. Option to randomize or favorite Snowman backgrounds in the wallpaper selector.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Shortcut to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Direct download option for wallpapers.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Snowman new tab.
